7#ifndef PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_H
8#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_H
9
10// Button mode
11// TODO: is this masked, or is the whole byte actually used for just this?
12
13enum pksav_gba_rse_button_mode
14{
15 PKSAV_GBA_RSE_BUTTON_MODE_NORMAL = 0x01,
16 PKSAV_GBA_RSE_BUTTON_MODE_LR = 0x02,
17 PKSAV_GBA_RSE_BUTTON_MODE_L_EQUALS_A = 0x03
18};
19
20enum pksav_gba_frlg_button_mode
21{
22 PKSAV_GBA_FRLG_BUTTON_MODE_HELP = 0x01,
23 PKSAV_GBA_FRLG_BUTTON_MODE_LR = 0x02,
24 PKSAV_GBA_FRLG_BUTTON_MODE_L_EQUALS_A = 0x03
25};
26
27// Text speed, textbox frame
28
29enum pksav_gba_text_speed
30{
31 PKSAV_GBA_TEXT_SPEED_SLOW = 0,
32 PKSAV_GBA_TEXT_SPEED_MEDIUM = 1,
33 PKSAV_GBA_TEXT_SPEED_FAST = 2
34};
35
36#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXT_SPEED_MASK ((uint8_t)7)
37
38#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_FRAME_OFFSET (3)
39
40#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_FRAME_MASK ((uint8_t)(31 << PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_FRAME_OFFSET))
41
42#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_MIN_FRAME ((uint8_t)0)
43#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_MAX_FRAME ((uint8_t)15)
44
45#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_FRAME(options_byte) \
46 ((uint8_t)(((options_byte) & PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_FRAME_MASK) >> PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_TEXTBOX_FRAME_OFFSET))
47
48// Sound, battle style, battle scene
49
50#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_SOUND_STEREO_MASK ((uint8_t)1)
51#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_BATTLE_STYLE_SET_MASK ((uint8_t)(1 << 1))
52#define PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_BATTLE_SCENE_DISABLE_MASK ((uint8_t)(1 << 2))
53
54#endif /* PKSAV_GBA_OPTIONS_H */
